legislation: Non-Domestic Rating (Collection and Enforcement) (Local Lists) (Amendment) (England) Regulations 2009
description: I. Letter dated 10/02/2009 from John Healey MP to Phyllis Starkey MP regarding a change in legislation to support English businesses facing back-dated rates liability. 4 p. II. Letter dated 10/02/2009 from John Healey MP to Phyllis Starkey MP regarding the same subject. 4 p. III. Letter dated 09/02/2009 from Stephen Speed, Inspector General and Agency Chief Executive, Insolvency Service, to John Healey MP regarding the impact of back-dated tax liability on future trading. 2 p. IV. Letter from the Business Rates Team, Department of Communities and Local Government, to chief finance officers of English billing authorities regarding changes to the Non-Domestic Rating (Collection and Enforcement) (Local Lists) Regulations. 7 p.
department: Dept for Communities and Local Government Treasury Insolvency Service
